member.name: T:HowToBeAHelper.Plugin
member.summary: The main class for every plugin for HowToBeAHelper. This class is the initializer and entry point for the API. From here every process is getting managed. This class is the only class with direct access to the API.

member.name: M:HowToBeAHelper.Plugin.OnStart
member.summary: Gets called when the plugin is getting started.

member.name: M:HowToBeAHelper.Plugin.OnStop
member.summary: Gets called when the plugin is getting stopped.

member.name: M:HowToBeAHelper.Plugin.OnInit
member.summary: Gets called when the plugin is initialized. The init step is shortly before any plugin is getting started.
